title: MITOUSDT Perpetual Contract Listing: Enjoy 0 Maker Fees & 50% off Taker Fees!
content: Dear BloFin Users, We are pleased to announce that the USDT-Margined perpetual contract for $ MITO will be listed at 12:45 (UTC) on Aug 28, 2025. The updates will cover both the web and app interfaces. The details are as follows: MITOUSDT Perpetual:FeatureDetailsUnderlying AssetMITO（Mitosis）Settlement AssetUSDTContract Size10 MITOPrice Quotation10 MITO value calculated in USDT equivalentTick Size0.00001Leverage1-50XFunding Fee Settlement Frequency Every 4 hoursTrading Hours24/7 The price limit rules of MITOUSDT perpetual trading are the same as those of other cryptos. Please refer to our Trading Guides for further details. Event: Trade MITOUSDT with 0 Maker Fees & 50% off Taker FeesTo celebrate the listing of the MITOUSDT trading pair on BloFin Futures, BloFin offers 0 Maker fees and 50% off Taker fees event for the first 48 hours for users when trading MITOUSDT, with Taker fees as low as 0.03%! To experience the innovative power of BloFin, please go to the BloFin website or download the App from the Apple App Store and Google Play Store to trade easily on the go. Thanks for your support! BloFin TeamAug 28, 2025 Find us on:X (Twitter)InstagramTelegramDiscordYoutube BloFin reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reason without prior notice. Risk Warning: Digital assets are highly speculative and subject to significant volatility. They may become illiquid at any time, and investors could lose the entire value of their investment. Before trading any digital asset, you should conduct your own research and assess your risk tolerance. BloFin is not liable for any losses you may incur from trading digital assets. This material should not be construed as financial advice. For more information, view our Terms of Use and Risk Warning.
